entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
